message.content: This question requires some understanding of basic physics and measurement tools. When an elephant is placed on a device that can measure the force being applied based on its mass, that device is called a scale. Option (A) is incorrect because atomic mass refers to the mass of an individual atom, not a measurement of force. A scale measures the weight of an object by balancing the force exerted by the object's mass against the force exerted by gravity.
